title: Traumatic rupture of lumbar intervertebral disc
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
block: Injuries to the abdomen, lower back, lumbar spine and pelvis
category: Dislocation, sprain and strain of joints and ligaments of lumbar spine and pelvis

rupture or displacement (nontraumatic) of lumbar intervertebral disc
